description.jp: 幼馴染のレムと共に０組に編入したアギト候補生。兄の戦死をきっかけに「死」という概念を極端に恐れるようになり 愛する者を救うための強大な力を渇望し続けている。素直で純粋な性格のせいか ときに周囲の声に翻弄され自分を見失ってしまう一面もある。
description.gl: Rem's childhood friend and an Agito cadet in Class 0. Developing an extreme fear of death after the loss of his brother to war, he lusts for power that would allow him to protect those he loves. Perhaps due to his pure and honest nature, he sometimes loses himself to the voices of those around him.

jp.text: アンタに何がわかるッ！
こんな仕事は……\nオレひとりで十分だ
弱いのはいやだ……\n守られるだけの存在なのはいやだ
オレは欲しい \n仲間を守ることができる圧倒的な力が……！
大切な人が居るって いいことじゃんか
レムは絶対に失わない 守り抜く！\n何をしてでも！

gl.text: What the hell do YOU know?
There's no need to involve her...
I hate being weak. I hate being a person who needs protection.
More than anything、 I want...the skills to protect others!
There's nothing wrong with a widdle boy who wuvs his mommy.
I will never lose Rem! I will protect her—no matter what!

desc.gl:
8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Increases BRV by 30% of cumulative HP damage dealt
All targets: 2 turns Spiral's Lynchpin
Self: 8 turns Piercing Power
Instant turn rate
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count (some abilities excluded)

Triggers following attack when attacking target afflicted with Spiral's Lynchpin debuff (some attacks excluded):
 • 4-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Increases BRV by 30% of cumulative HP damage dealt

与えた合計HPダメージの30％分
自身のBRVをアップさせる

行動負荷がない

desc.gl:
Awakening use +3

When using Awakening:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slight boost to raised MAX BRV, ATK from Awakening buff
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during burst mode, summoning, support

When using Furious Blades:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before first BRV attack
 • 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack becomes 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Instant turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break

While Awakening buff active:
 • BRV Attack becomes following BRV Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Higher turn rate

When inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break with Awakening, Furious Blades, BRV Attack+:
 • Furious Blades becomes following Furious Blades+:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK
 • 2-hit melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt after first HP attack
 • Fills own recast gauge by 20%
 • Extends own active buff duration 1 turn
 • High turn rate
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during burst mode, summoning, support
 • Returns to Furious Blades after use

name.jp: 喪失への恐れエクステンド

desc.gl:
When using Stunning Slash:
 • Inflicts Spiral's Lynchpin before attack
 • 8-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack becomes:
 • 3-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
 • 5-hit group melee BRV attack + group HP attack
 • Largely increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Spiral's Lynchpin duration +2

Adds following effects to Piercing Power:
 • Slightly raises own MAX BRV
 • Increases own BRV damage dealt
 • Further increases own BRV damage dealt when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
 • Slightly increases own HP damage dealt
 • Slightly increases own BRV gain

Adds following effects to Spiral's Lynchpin:
 • Triggers additional attack after turn of target afflicted with Spiral's Lynchpin

When additional attack triggered:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before BRV attack
desc.jp:
クエスト開始時
自身に4ACTION「突き抜ける力」付与

「スタンブレイド」使用時
・攻撃前に「螺旋の楔」付与に変化
・8HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を4回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・「螺旋の楔」の4ACTION期間延長

「突き抜ける力」に以下の効果が追加
・自身の最大BRV小アップ
・自身の与えるBRVダメージがアップし ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時はさらにアップ
・自身の与えるHPダメージがアップし ブレイク時 ブレイク中攻撃時はさらにアップ
・自身の受けるBRV加算効果小アップ

「螺旋の楔」に以下の効果が追加
・「螺旋の楔」が付与されている
　対象の行動後 「追加攻撃」が発動

「追加攻撃」発動時
・最初のBRV攻撃前に自身に
　自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRVを加算
・4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃が
　4HIT全体近距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
